title: Genome
desc: Identify chromosomal regions of interest by projecting data onto a visual representation of the genome. Overlay CNV, Gistic or expression data along with TADâ€™s and Cytobands.

title: Genome
desc: Under the parameters panel, in the geneset dropdown select from thousands of genesets and dynamically apply them to the chromosomes.

title: Genome
desc: Using HGNC as a reference click the label dropdown and add HUGO gene symbol or label genes on the chromosome by type.

title: Genome
desc: Add dimensions by labeling gene type, mean scores, max/min values and more with the color and shape dropdown menus, all references appear in the legend parameters section.

title: Genome
desc: Select which genome reference alignment to view, hg19 or hg38.

title: Genome
desc: Toggle Hg19 topologically associating domains (TADs) ON or OFF

title: Genome
desc: Click split screen (upper right hand corner) to connect the chromosomes to other visualiztions, e.g. various clustering methods.
